title: Research Topic: Business Roundtable Formation 1972
summary: Based on the research priority 'Business Roundtable Formation 1972', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Investigate Business Roundtable founding as CEO lobbying organization parallel to Powell Memo implementation. Connect to current members' capture activities.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
